alert.note: Alert for Northern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 4:46PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Rutherford, southeastern Polk, northwestern Cleveland and northwestern Spartanburg Counties through 530 PM EST... At 446 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Columbus, or 6 miles north of Lake Bowen, moving northeast at 95 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Forest City, Rutherfordton, Columbus, Spindale, Landrum, Tryon, Belwood, Lawndale, Fallston and Campobello. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EST for western and the Piedmont of North Carolina...and Upstate South Carolina.
